mapper.sql: p.id, p.title, p.note, p.image_url, p.supplier_price, p.sales_price, p.group_id, p.level, p.update_time, p.update_by,p.sort,p.gift
mapper.select:
select
, b.uname as up_uname, b.unick as up_unick
from td_agent_product p
left join td_user b on b.uid= p.update_by
where 1=1
order by p.sort asc,p.id asc
order by p.sort desc,p.id asc
order by p.id asc
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into td_agent_product
title,
note,
image_url,
supplier_price,
sales_price,
group_id,
level,
update_time,
update_by,
sort,
gift,
#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{note,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
#{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{supplierPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{salesPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{gift,jdbcType=BIT},
mapper.update:
update td_agent_product
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
note = #{note,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
image_url = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_price = #{supplierPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sales_price = #{salesPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gift = #{gift,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update td_agent_product set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, image_url = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_price = #{supplierPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sales_price = #{salesPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gift = #{gift,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
